mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Blair, Jacob B.; Boreman, Arthur I. to Pierpont, Francis Harrison
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Blair, Jacob B.; Boreman, Arthur I.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling May 5 1863. By Telegraph from Parkersburg 5 1863. Genl Roberts has taken all troops from here except two hundred to West Union. We are without defense except a gunboat Can't you get aid through Gov Tod we have no arms for the militia answer AJ Boreman JB Blair 35q115pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Blair, Jacob B.; Boreman, Arthur I.
Parkersburg, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis Harrison
